name: Topo Designs Accessory Bags 3pk
description:
Item: Accessory bags. The small size is perfect for the real necessities on the road. The medium size is great for wrangling power cables, chargers, and the like. The large size fits an iPad, or you can just stuff it with more gear.

Details: 1000d Cordura for the exterior and coated pack cloth for an entirely lined inner compartment.  YKK zippers. Made in the USA.

Brand: Growing up in the mountains of the West; Jedd Rose and Mark Hansen have been using gear from their earliest memories. They have been fishers, hunters, ski instructors, hikers, climbers, bikers, travelers, and through it all they’ve searched for gear that really works – as well as satisfies the styles that they were attracted to. Never satisfied with the standard fare, sought out ski gear from France, bags from Japan, all the while honing their tastes and growing a seed of desire to create something themselves. Topo bags are all made in a LEED certified building in Colorado, USA with an amazing view of the Rockies

name: Topo Designs Mini Hip Pack
description:
Item: The Mini Hip Pack is the perfect solution for those times where you don’t want to haul a bigger bag but have just a bit too much to stuff in your pockets. Great for keys, phone, a camera and can even handle a jacket to cinched at the bottom. 

Details: 1000d Cordura for the exterior and a 420d water-resistant pack cloth for the inner liner. Natural leather lash tabs are perfect for securing extra gear with accessory straps or attaching a bike light. The lower cinch straps are perfect for securing extra or oversized gear. Made in the USA.

Growing up in the mountains of the West; Jedd Rose and Mark Hansen have been using gear from their earliest memories. All seam-sealed
Durable Uretek zippers

One size fits most

Brand: Based in Providence, R.I., Cleverhood created a smart-looking, high-performance street cape and certainly a new sense of style and function.

Brand: New fine American basic, BD Baggies, the classic American button-down shirt brand, has been completely modernized in terms of concept, style and product. Under the creative direction and design of David Mullen, one of the emerging names in the American Panorama, the BD Baggies project returns to the American origins of the brand.

Designed in the USA, from 100% pre-laundered cloth which has a lived-in look and an unmistakable appeal. “A shirt wearable as a tee”. The collection contains original styles, innovative fabrics and designs and a new fit.

Brand: Growing up in the mountains of the West; Jedd Rose and Mark Hansen have been using gear from their earliest memories. They have been fishers, hunters, ski instructors, hikers, climbers, bikers, travelers, and through it all they’ve searched for gear that really works – as well as satisfies the styles that they were attracted to. Never satisfied with the standard fare, sought out ski gear from France, bags from Japan, all the while honing their tastes and growing a seed of desire to create something themselves. Topo bags are all made in a LEED certified building in Colorado, USA with an amazing view of the Rockies.

name: Freeman Rain Jacket in Red
description:
Item: 2-ply, waterproof/breathable outer layer with a soft, flannel lined interior.  Traditionally styled with a clean tailored fit, this jacket is perfectly suited for the wilderness wanderer or the sidewalk socialite.

Details: shell 100% nylon, lining 100% cotton, made in Seattle

Model is wearing size 34

Model measurements: 
Height: 6'; Weight: 167 lbs.; Chest: 38R

Brand: Freeman started at a kitchen table in a small apartment in the heart of Seattle with the goal of building industry quality goods right here at home.   With a focus on fit, function and classic styling they have set out to make that product that everyone has been looking for, but could never quite find.  In an age when everything seems to be made somewhere else, Freeman would like to say:  Welcome to Seattle.

Detail: The candles are developed from a unique combination of premium paraffin and soy, blended with fragrance into a balm of solid perfume – contents are pure enough to rub into your skin.

Brand: Matt and Carrie Eddmenson worked together at an off-shoot of her paternal grandfather’s textile company creating many denim styles and washes for companies such as Levi’s, RRL, Rogan and Earnest Sewn. When the company closed its doors in 2008, they set out to create a new, more compact version of the company.

name: Immogene & Willie Hank in Rigid
description:
Item: A classic-fitting straight leg jean with more room in the thigh and knee area than Willie. It has a medium rise and cleaner, more modern fit than many of its traditional-fitting vintage predecessors. Perfect for someone with a more athletic build or the guy who just likes a relaxed fit in the leg, leg opening in base size is 17 inches.

Details: Made from premium 13.50 oz Cone Mills selvage denim, 34" inseam and woven with care in the USA on antique shuttle looms. This jean runs large. For best results, we recommend purchasing two sizes smaller for a normal fit, one size for a looser fit, same size for a generous fit.

Brand: Matt and Carrie Eddmenson worked together at an off-shoot of her paternal grandfather’s textile company creating many denim styles and washes for companies such as Levi’s, RRL, Rogan and Earnest Sewn. When the company closed its doors in 2008, they set out to create a new, more compact version of the company.

Note: We can hem your jeans for only $12; check out "Alterations" under our brands.

name: Imogene & Willie Willie in Rigid Indigo
description:
Item: The signature Willie cut was created as a reaction to what wasn’t happening. When Matt started working on the design five years ago, it was impossible to find a rigid selvage denim jean with no branding, a classic straight leg, and a rise sitting above the hips. So he made one – adding back pockets deep enough to accommodate a small notebook and crafting a leg opening just wide enough to fit over a pair of boots. As a result, the Willie – named for Carrie’s grandfather - is remarkable in its simplicity.

Details: Made from 13.5-ounce premium Cone Mills selvage denim, 34" inseam and woven with care in the USA on antique shuttle looms. This jean runs large. For best results, we recommend purchasing one size smaller for a normal fit, two sizes smaller for a tight fit, same size for a looser fit.

Brand: Matt and Carrie Eddmenson worked together at an off-shoot of her paternal grandfather’s textile company creating many denim styles and washes for companies such as Levi’s, RRL, Rogan and Earnest Sewn.
